author: wsjcom
title: New Toshiba CEO Says He Is Committed to Pushing Through Chip-Unit Sale
text:
Toshiba Corp.’s new chief executive said Tuesday that the company remains committed to push through its $20 billion chip-unit sale and he will focus on service-based businesses for growth.
The comments from Nobuaki Kurumatani, who took office this week, come amid increasing demands by investors that the conglomerate walk away from its ¥2 trillion ($18.9 billion) deal with U.S. private-equity Bain Capital.
